topicTitle: im taking a break until gash comes back

posts.postText:
im not risking the chance of bad things happening to me while hes gone

plus i need a break from you guys so i can cool off 

fill me in on news and stuff 

i think farrow is holding the fort while hes gone, keep up the good work.

bye 


Smooglez
Maybe smooglez and gash are the same person o.O  like Superman and Clark Kent.

Uhh, just because gash is here or not doesn't change anything if were attacked, just like last time. 
Nobody is really holding down the fort. Life goes on in nnjg just as anything else would
